body.name: PCCOOLER 120mm Case Fan 3 Pack ARGB Computer Case Fans Quiet Fans Advanced Lighting Customizations with 7 Colors&10 Lighting Modes - PWM High Performance Cooling Fan for PC Case Computer Fan
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 5 mins
features: 【Premium Cooling Fan】Increasing more colorful in the user's case by add the awesome ARGB light in the FX-120 ARGB Case Fan. Each 120MM rgb fan comes with 6 high-brightness LED lamp beads. Three 120MM fans provide excellent heat dissipation, add fun and bring you better gaming experience.

【Special Threaded Blade Design】The special 9-blade special thread design can minimize resistance and further improve fan performance. The output air flow reaches 31.68CFM under the standard of 1200 rpm, which effectively optimizes the air duct of the chassis and helps dust removal.

【Effective Shock Absorption Design】FX-120 case fan is surrounded by 4 soft silicone cushions which widely decreased the noise from fan vibration under high speeds.Highly optimised low-noise design provides outstanding quietness of operation. The maximum noise of the fan is only 18dBA. Quiet sound like falling leaves. The noise reduction technology and heat dissipation performance are greatly help customers to build a perfect case cooling system.

【High Performance Hydraulic Bearings】FX-120 fan adopts hydraulic bearing technology. High-performance sleeve bearing with high-performance and lasting bearing technology. It can absorb and conserve lubricating oil. Reducing wear and noise effectively. The bearing life can reach more than 40,000 hours.

【Simple Installation】RGB case fan is compatible with all types of chassis and easy to install. Humanized power supply interface design, two interfaces of small 3PIN on the motherboard and 4PIN for power supply D-type Port. Please do not connect 4PIN and 3PIN at the same time to avoid short circuit! Tips: FX-120 Case fan does not have ARGB function, and there is no remote control and controller. Please do not connect them to the controller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and work great.
reviews.reviewText: OK, so they look sweet and are quiet, I waited on the review to see if they would die or get loud. Nope they are solid and working good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars your ears (and maybe eyes) will thank you!
reviews.reviewText: I can't believe I didn't do this sooner. One of my top fans went bad last year so I threw one in that was quieter. It was also old, but newer than what was in there. The one remaining was loud but not noisy, you know? I guess I got used to it, but I'm pretty sure it has been getting louder.So I'm glad I got the 3 pack, which is a great deal compared to the single fans from the bigger brands. I replaced both fans - the really old loud one, and the newer loud one (ha). The old 7 blade fans are gone, in with these 9 blade jobs. More blades, ball bearings, maybe slower speed I don't know what's magic about them -- but these are SO quiet! I love the product description "Quiet sound like falling leaves. " I think I can hear the CPU fan over the case fans now. The air coming out is cool and at least subjectively, seems to produce about the same air flow.And they look darn good, too.I'm a fan.Sorry, couldn't resist the punny dad joke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very high quality color
reviews.reviewText: The noise level is decent and the color looks very good, super affordable and worth it. This is a good alternative to expensive ones which a lot of pc fans are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pretty fast delivery, clean, easy to install. Work great and everything looks amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth $6-$7 a fan
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking at these, my guess is you just want to add some RGB to your pc, and maybe provide a little crossflow, intake, exhaust.These are NOT fans you would want to use to cool a CPU/Radiator. They are rated for a max of 1200rpm.You get what you pay for, these do NOT come with a hub/controller, but you can daisy chain them, just make sure you have one 4pin CPU_FAN on your mobo.Im giving 5 stars because I assume most people looking at these know what they are getting into. Please note these are not ARGB, they are RGB, but still add fantastic color to an otherwise dark setup.This is definitely not a negative review, I just want to make it known these are not high RPM fans that should be responsible for your AIO/RADIATOR/COOLER TOWER, but are a fantastic way to provide additional airflow at a very fair price, and also great for older builds that do not have 3-pin ARGB headers.Hope this helps, would recommend and would buy again! Easy to install.See attached pics-this is a 2016 build with an MSI MB i7-7700/1080 GPU. It had no RGB inside the case other than the little light strip seen in the picture.🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These fans are great. They are not loud and do provide adequate air flow. Currently they are connected to my psu and works flawlessly. I would recomend. Still works even if your mobo dosnt have rgb function through the psu

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Silent, but doesn't push much air
reviews.reviewText: Replaced my old front fan with two (case only came with one front preinstalled but had slots for 2) and installed the third next to the PSU to pull up air from the bottom to give some air to the GPU.First thing I did was feel the airflow because the fans don't have markings for airflow, and noticed it's pushing about as much air as a 3 year olds fart. Having more fans seems to be making up for the lack of flow from each fan, but will probably be upgrading later on down the road to some higher cfm fans, as you can almost not even feel the airflow from these just holding them in your hands.But, complaining aside, they are whisper quiet, literally can't hear any of these fans while at my desk, just wish they ran maybe a bit faster (they're all connected via molex). And they do push more air than the singular one they replaced, my computer is cooler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No complaints here. easy to install and they look neat. Computer has stopped overheating. They are quiet as well.
Great fans for the price. Super quiet great price would buy again. Bought 3 pack and ordered another 3 pack.

reviews.reviewTitle: Parfait pour le prix mais fais un peux de bruit
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Elles sont vraiment performante et très belle pour le prix à conseiller.

Reading the description it didn't seem clear what kind of connection (3 pin or 4 pin) was available on these fans. I specifically wanted 4 pin for fan speed control from the MOBO and took a guess on the purchase. They look nice and they feel like they're solidly made but since they only have 3 pin and a molex plug I ended up returning them.So can't speak to the quality of the product but the store page should be changed to be more accurate.
these are great for the price
